players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I have proof that Bob is the mafioso. We need to vote him out now to keep our town safe."
Charlie: "Diana, can you share your proof about Bob? We need to be careful before voting someone out, especially with limited information."
Diana: "I understand the need for caution, Charlie. I investigated Bob last night and confirmed he is the mafioso. I have no reason to lie; voting him out now is our best chance to protect the town."
Charlie: "Diana, your claim is serious. Bob, how do you respond? We must make sure no one is falsely accused before voting."
You: "I deny the accusations. I have no reason to lie, and I'm innocent of any wrongdoings."
